line_1: Such reas'ning falls like an inverted cone,
line_2: Wanting its proper base to stand upon.

line_1: 'Mid the gay towers on steep Din's Branna's cone,
line_2: O! Harp of Cambria, never hast thou known

line_1: Bleak as they stand upon their steepy cone,
line_2: Thus consecrate to LOVE, in ages flown, —
